title: Don't Just Take Our Word For It
subtitle: Over 1,000 happy customers across Ireland — here's what they have to say about working with us!

items.quote: Professional service from beginning to end. I was happy with all aspects of this company for my solar panel installation. Roofers and electrician were competent and professional — listened to the customer and explained everything. Office staff speedy to respond and made the whole process easy.
items.author: Miriam Murphy

items.quote: I couldn't recommend Green House highly enough. From the outset they were professional, friendly and experts in what they delivered. From the office team, to the on site consultant, roofing team and electricians they all knew what they were doing. Really competitively priced too.
items.author: Enda Collins

items.quote: The Green House team were amazing from start to finish. Super easy to deal with, clear communication, install completed quickly and seamlessly, the panels look great and work a dream. Couldn't recommend them more!
items.author: Carol Dalton

items.quote: We can only speak in the highest possible terms of our experience with Green House Renewables. From the very initial visit right through to the completion, all work was carried out in a timely and professional way by all the courteous and pleasant Green House team.
items.author: Patrick J Cusack

items.quote: Installed a 6.3 kWh system on my house with a 5.3 kW battery — great job, very professional and system running smoothly. Have recommended them to a friend also who is looking at getting it done.
items.author: Derek Boyle

items.quote: One of the best contractors I've dealt with in my 72 years. Very responsive from first contact until the job was done. Came on time, did what needed to be done very quickly and told me what I needed to know. Can't recommend all of them highly enough.
items.author: Tom Farrell

items.quote: Everyone at Green-House was fantastic, from those in the office to everybody on site. The work is so meticulous, clean, and neat that you'd think we had solar power forever. Everyone was pleasant, informative, and proud of their work.
items.author: Tom Johnson

items.quote: GreenHouse team did a really excellent job and surpassed my expectations in terms of the quality of the work done and their professionalism. Cabling was well thought through and none visible by the time they had finished. After sales service is second to none.
items.author: Eugene Hughes

items.quote: Team Greenhouse deserve 10 stars. The guys did a fantastic retrofit for new HP and PV array. They made a potentially disruptive install a dream! All the works done and dusted on schedule and exceptionally tidy. We are super pleased with the performance.
items.author: D Judge

items.quote: Good company. Price was competitive, installation was clean and efficient, and everything has been working great.
items.author: James Carroll

items.quote: We are very pleased with the installation and performance of the solar PV system and look forward to what it will do on the long hot sunny days of summer! It was a pleasure to deal with Green House and I highly recommend them.
items.author: Jim Smith

items.quote: They installed solar panels and underfloor heating for our business. We then went with their heat pumps as the services, quality and price was pretty good compared to others in the market.
items.author: Smarketing Cloud
